content.title: AdS/CFT Correspondence: Holography and Emergent Spacetime
content.abstract: The Anti-de Sitter/Conformal Field Theory (AdS/CFT) correspondence is a conjectured exact equivalence between a theory of quantum gravity in (d+1)-dimensional anti-de Sitter space and a conformal field theory in d dimensions without gravity. It provides the most concrete realization of the holographic principle and suggests spacetime may be emergent.
content.statement: AdS/CFT Correspondence: Holography and Emergent Spacetime is a fundamental concept in Natural-Sciences Physics Quantum-Mechanics Planck-Units that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

anti_de_sitter_space.definition: Maximally symmetric spacetime with constant negative curvature
anti_de_sitter_space.geometry: Lorentzian hyperboloid; has timelike boundary at infinity
anti_de_sitter_space.cosmological_constant: Λ < 0 (negative, unlike our universe with Λ > 0)

conformal_field_theory.definition: Quantum field theory invariant under conformal (angle-preserving) transformations
conformal_field_theory.properties: Scale invariant; no length scale; no running couplings

holographic_dictionary.definition: Map between bulk quantities and boundary quantities

ryu_takayanagi_formula.interpretation: Entanglement entropy of boundary region A equals area of minimal bulk surface γ_A

physical_predictions.description: Local bulk physics emerges from non-local boundary correlations
physical_predictions.mechanism: CFT operators at different points combine to form local bulk fields
physical_predictions.status: Understood in perturbation theory; non-perturbative understanding developing

physical_predictions.description: Black holes in AdS correspond to thermal states in CFT
physical_predictions.calculation: Hawking-Page transition = deconfinement transition in CFT
physical_predictions.status: Well-established; one of earliest confirmations of AdS/CFT

physical_predictions.description: Bulk spatial geometry is dual to boundary entanglement structure
physical_predictions.status: Strong evidence; drives modern quantum gravity research

physical_predictions.description: η/s ≥ ℏ/(4πk_B) for strongly coupled systems
physical_predictions.application: Applied to quark-gluon plasma in heavy ion collisions

implications_for_planck_scale.emergent_spacetime: Bulk spacetime (including Planck-scale physics) emerges from boundary CFT
implications_for_planck_scale.no_fundamental_gravity: Gravity is not fundamental but emergent from entanglement
implications_for_planck_scale.planck_length_meaning: ℓ_P in bulk corresponds to strong coupling in boundary theory
implications_for_planck_scale.black_hole_information: Information is preserved in boundary CFT; resolves paradox in AdS

evidence_for_correspondence.description: SO(4,2) isometry of AdS₅ = Conformal group in 4D
3-point functions computed in both theories agree exactly
Conformal anomaly c = N² agrees on both sides
Spectrum of operator dimensions matches string spectrum exactly
evidence_for_correspondence.strength: Extremely strong; infinite number of checks

evidence_for_correspondence.description: Black hole entropy matches CFT thermal entropy

open_questions: Does a dS/CFT (for positive cosmological constant) exist?
How does the bulk emerge from the boundary microscopically?
What is the role of quantum error correction in holography?
Can we use holography to solve QCD?
